about_the_game:
The 9th Charnel is a first-person psychological survival horror game. Filled with a rich and frightening atmosphere, this game aims at providing a haunting and desperate action-survival experience. While exploring the many mysteries of this world, you must survive- whether you do it through stealth or by using weapons.

Most of the time, the player has to survive impossible threats through stealth and clever navigation of the environment. As the player progresses through the game and threats grow significantly more complex, the player uncovers new stories and receives new weapons.

At its scariest, the game preys on the player’s anxiety, survival, and Exploration skills. It takes place in a not-so-future world, where people have lost faith in the prosperity of human development, people are selfish, and governments are corrupt.



  • The 9th Charnel takes the player on a journey through a world filled with terror and suspense. With realistic graphics, an immersive soundtrack, and a captivating storyline, this game offers an unforgettable experience for fans of the horror genre.
  • In this game, the player takes on the role of Michael J. Jones (one of 6 characters). All the character are well fleshed out, each with their own unique backstory and motivations.
  • The inventory system allows the player to gather resources and manage their supplies, while the weapon combat and stealth mechanics keep the player on their toes.
  • As the player progresses through the game, they will encounter various puzzles and challenges that test their survival skills and their ability to think on their feet.
  • With a heavy focus on story, The 9th Charnel offers a rich, narrative experience that will keep players engaged and on the edge of their seat.


Michael and his colleagues - Sara Whitlock and Daniel J. Hart- are genetic scientists at The Epsilon Research Institute. In one of their curriculum, they decide to conduct research at the nearest wildlife sanctuary. On their ill-fated journey, they encounter an inconceivable incident. As a result, their car rolls down the road into a deep valley-type area. Stuck in a valley, alone, Michael must find his friends and survive multiple dangerous life-threatening incidents that lead them to believe that the place has a history of evil activities. To see the fate of the three friends, play to the end.

Overall, The 9th Charnel is a horror game that combines intense atmosphere, strategic thinking, and a gripping story-line to create a truly unique gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes that some viewers may find disturbing and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050, Radeon RX 560 4GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Performance requirements may change as the game is currently getting optimized.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7th Generation and above or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Storage is recommended
